about_the_game:
In distant mythical times, countless skyislands floated in the sky, miracles held together by ancient magical and elemental powers.
And you will be the reborn prince of the Pumpkin people, building defenses and traps against enemies. Build our home, revive our economy, and restore our kingdom to its glory!

-a thousand Things Wait to Be Done-

The whole royal city has been almost reduced to ruins by the torrent of history. Bulldoze those ruins and wastelands and turn them into people's houses and farmland!

-build Defense-

An arrow tower? The lightning tower? The Sorcerer's tower? Trap? If it works, build it!
However, if we are to defeat these monsters, we may need "a little financial support"!

-resist the Monster Enemy-

The kingdom was once full of glory, but it faded in the wind and frost. But these ambitious enemies will not rest there, whether they are monster or air bandits, we must not let them near the heart of the island!

-Magic world-

Do you remember the magic you used in your lifetime? Perhaps not much impression, but it doesn't matter, driving the kingdom of the skyisland adventure, find those lost things!

Oh, right! You have to accumulate magic to be able to use powerful spells, it is common knowledge in the world!
detailed_description:
In distant mythical times, countless skyislands floated in the sky, miracles held together by ancient magical and elemental powers.
And you will be the reborn prince of the Pumpkin people, building defenses and traps against enemies. Build our home, revive our economy, and restore our kingdom to its glory!

-a thousand Things Wait to Be Done-

The whole royal city has been almost reduced to ruins by the torrent of history. Bulldoze those ruins and wastelands and turn them into people's houses and farmland!

-build Defense-

An arrow tower? The lightning tower? The Sorcerer's tower? Trap? If it works, build it!
However, if we are to defeat these monsters, we may need "a little financial support"!

-resist the Monster Enemy-

The kingdom was once full of glory, but it faded in the wind and frost. But these ambitious enemies will not rest there, whether they are monster or air bandits, we must not let them near the heart of the island!

-Magic world-

Do you remember the magic you used in your lifetime? Perhaps not much impression, but it doesn't matter, driving the kingdom of the skyisland adventure, find those lost things!

Oh, right! You have to accumulate magic to be able to use powerful spells, it is common knowledge in the world!
name: Skyline Defense: Legends of the Aether

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 9600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 11600 / AMD R5-5600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

short_description: Design and build your defenses against various enemies on countless skyislands in this city-building, siege and exploration tower defense game. Unleash magic in the city to direct the battle and hold the island heart of the kingdom.
